metadata.title: CVE-2019-19035 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
jhead 3.03 is affected by: heap-based buffer over-read. The impact is:Denial of service. The component is: ReadJpegSections and process_SOFn injpgfile.c. The attack vector is: Open a specially crafted JPEG file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19035` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

jhead - 1:3.04-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jhead package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:3.04-1').
